document.title: W224 Preparing Your Evacuation Grab-and-Go Bag

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Disaster can strike anywhere. Depending on where you live, you may need to prepare to leave your home quickly because of floods, fires, tornadoes, earthquakes or hurricanes. Such man-made disasters as chemical spills and nuclear contamination are also possible. In case you have to leave your home unexpectedly, a little preparation can make a big difference in your ability to recover from the losses you incur.
